column1: Smoque BBQ////The rest of the experience was a solid four. I wasn't blown away by the mac and cheese
column2: and I can't handle the vineger slaw that yankees insist on calling cole slaw (if it's not creamy
column3: it's not cole slaw.) That being said
column4: I still ate all the mac and cheese and slaw on my plate
column5: so it's not like they were bad.
